question: List all the booked seats for flight number 4946 from MEX to MLM on July 7th, 2024.
query:
SELECT postgres_air.boarding_pass.seat
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg ON postgres_air.boarding_pass.booking_leg_id = postgres_air.booking_leg.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight ON postgres_air.booking_leg.flight_id = postgres_air.flight.flight_id
WHERE postgres_air.flight.flight_no = '4946'
  AND postgres_air.flight.departure_airport = 'MEX'
  AND postgres_air.flight.arrival_airport = 'MLM'
  AND postgres_air.flight.scheduled_departure >= '2024-07-07' AND postgres_air.flight.scheduled_departure < '2024-07-08';
